snippet: The helicopter struck a crane and crashed close to the headquarters of Britain’s MI6 spy agency, exploding into flames during the morning rush hour, the police said.
abstract: Helicopter crashes into crane atop residential tower in central London, exploding into flames and hurtling to ground during morning rush hour.

byline.original: By LARK TURNER and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Lark Turner reported from London, and Alan Cowell from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The helicopter struck a crane and crashed close to the headquarters of Britain’s MI6 spy agency, exploding into flames during the morning rush hour, the police said.

headline.seo: Helicopter Crashes in Central London, Killing 2
headline.main: Helicopter Crash Leaves 2 Dead in Central London
headline.print_headline: Helicopter Crash Leaves 2 Dead in Central London
